metadata.title: CVE-2019-10320 jenkins-credentials-plugin: Certificate file read vulnerability in Credentials Plugin (SECURITY-1322) (moderate)
metadata.description: DOCUMENTATION: The MITRE CVE dictionary describes this issue as: Jenkins Credentials Plugin 2.1.18 and earlier allowed users with permission to create or update credentials to confirm the existence of files on the Jenkins master with an attacker-specified path, and obtain the certificate content of files containing a PKCS#12 certificate.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 is installed
jenkins-2-plugins is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
